      • searchInput

        public static boolean searchInput(java.lang.String search,
                                  java.lang.String[] array,
                                  int length)
        searches for an input on a given array.
        pre: The parameters are initialized.
        post: True if input is on array. False if input is not on array.
        Parameters:
        search - Entry to search. search!="" and search!=null.
        array - Place to look. array!=null.
        length - length of the array. length>0 and length!=null.

      • calculateTotal

        public static double calculateTotal(double[] array,
                                    int[] quantity,
                                    int quantityMaterials)
        Calculates the total purchase valur
        pre: Parameters are initialized.
        post: returns a positive Real number that represents the purchase value
        Parameters:
        array - Prices of the materials. array>0 and array!=null.
        quantity - Quantity of material requested. quantity>0 and quantity!=null.
        quantityMaterials - Quantity of input materials. quantityMaterials>0 and quantityMaterials!=null.

        post: Returns a positive integer that represents the total workforce.
        Parameters:

        quantityMaterials - Quantity of input materials. quantityMaterials>0 and quantityMaterials!=null

      • bestPrices

        public static double[] bestPrices(double[] pricesHC,
                                  double[] pricesCentro,
                                  double[] pricesBarrio,
                                  int quantityMaterials)
        Finds the lowest prices in each postition by comparing 3 arrays.
        pre: Parameters are initialized.
        post: Returns an array with the lowest Prices in each store.
        Parameters:
        pricesHC - Prices in HomeCenter. pricesHC>0 and pricesHC!=null.
        pricesCentro - Prices in ferreteria del Centro. pricesCentro>0 and pricesCentro!=null.
        pricesBarrio - Prices in ferreteria del barrio. pricesBarrio>0 and pricesBarrio!=null.
        quantityMaterials. - Quantity of input materials. quantityMaterials>0 and quantityMaterials!=null.

      • bestStores

        public static java.lang.String[] bestStores(double[] pricesHC,
                                            double[] pricesCentro,
                                            double[] pricesBarrio,
                                            int quantityMaterials)
        Finds the stores that have the lowest prices.
        pre: Parameters are initialized.
        post: Returns the stores that have the lowest prices.
        Parameters:
        pricesHC - Prices in HomeCenter. pricesHC>0 and pricesHC!=null.
        pricesCentro - Prices in ferreteria del Centro. pricesCentro>0 and pricesCentro!=null.
        pricesBarrio - Prices in ferreteria del barrio. pricesBarrio>0 and pricesBarrio!=null
        quantityMaterials - quantity of input materials. quantityMaterials>0 and quantityMaterials!=null

                                          java.lang.String location)
        Calculates the amount to pay for tansportation.
        pre: Parameters are initialized.
        post: Returns a positive integer that represents the amount to pay for transportation.
        Parameters:

        location - The location of the property.
